bespoke-theme-terminal

A Bespoke.js theme by Tobias Tebbi

Have you ever ...

... hated slideshow presentations for the fact, ...

... that the sentence you were just reading ...

... is on a slide that just vanished?

While on the good old blackboard,

everything stays for quite some time

just because the lecturer is too lazy

to wipe it out.

Well, then here is the solution.

  • This is a theme for bespoke.js
  • It works with any existing bespoke.js presentation

How It Works

  • Slides fill half the screen or more if they contain much content
  • The remaining space is used to display preceding slides in compacted form
  • The theme clearly higlights the current slide
  • But gives you the freedom to look back
  • The slides are always in 4:3 format ... to ensure your formatting works on any screen
  • But additional space is still used for the previous slides

Give it a try!
